# ui-tab



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Individual tab trigger

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute  | Description                                                | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`           | `disabled` | Whether the tab is disabled                                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value` _(required)_ | `value`    | Unique value for this tab (must match corresponding panel) | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot           | Description                        |
| -------------- | ---------------------------------- |
|                | Default slot for tab label content |
| `"icon-end"`   | Icon after label                   |
| `"icon-start"` | Icon before label                  |
